newsitem.title: USA: Arrow Automotive to shut a California plant.
newsitem.headline: Arrow Automotive to shut a California plant.

text.p: Arrow Automotive Industries said on Thursday it would close its Santa Maria, Calif. production facility.
Parts previously made at the California plant would be made at a Morrilton, Ark. facility, the company said in a statement.
The company said it would take a restructuring charge in the first quarter, but did not yet know for how much.
It said it would continue to operate a fully-staffed distribution center in Santa Maria and it was offering a relocation package to many employees at the plant.
